trans-unit.id:
To make new language setting take effect, please restart application with following steps:

1. Double-tap Home button on your device.

2. Swipe up to terminate application in the background.

3. Start application from home screen.
trans-unit.source:
To make new language setting take effect, please restart application with following steps:
1. Double-tap Home button on your device.
2. Swipe up to terminate application in the background.
3. Start application from home screen.
trans-unit.target:
Um neue Spracheinstellung wirksam werden, bitte neu starten Anwendung mit folgenden Schritten:
1. Doppeltippen Home-Taste auf Ihrem Gerät.
2. Swipe nach oben Anwendung im Hintergrund zu beenden.
3. Starten Sie Anwendung von Home-Bildschirm.
trans-unit.note: One of the titles on the Alert view.
There is a string on the input text view on home screen, promoting user to touch the text box to start typing.
There are categories on the settings page, this is one of the category.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial cards are successfully restored, you can go check them out now!
trans-unit.target: Tutorial-Karten erfolgreich wiederhergestellt sind, können Sie sie aus gehen jetzt überprüfen!

trans-unit.id: When the ambient light is low with Switch Automatically turned on, the app will automatically switch to Night theme.
trans-unit.source: When the ambient light is low with Switch Automatically turned on, the app will automatically switch to Night theme.
trans-unit.target: Wenn das Umgebungslicht niedrig mit Schalter wird automatisch eingeschaltet, wird die App automatisch in den Nacht-Thema.
trans-unit.note: There are many sections on the settings page, this one explains what does Auto Switch button in Appearance section do.

trans-unit.id: When you have it on, the App will try to auto-correct misspelled words when decoding Morse code. The dictionary changes when you change your language setting.
trans-unit.source: When you have it on, the App will try to auto-correct misspelled words when decoding Morse code. The dictionary changes when you change your language setting.
trans-unit.target: Wenn Sie es haben auf, wird die App versuchen, automatisch zu korrigieren falsch geschriebene Wörter, wenn Code Morse Decodierung. Das Wörterbuch ändert sich, wenn Sie Ihre Spracheinstellung ändern.
trans-unit.note: Explains what Auto Correct Mis Spelled Words does.

trans-unit.id: When you have it on, the screen will temporarily become brighter while you send Morse signal, so you can use it as a light source.
trans-unit.source: When you have it on, the screen will temporarily become brighter while you send Morse signal, so you can use it as a light source.
trans-unit.target: Wenn Sie es haben auf, wird der Bildschirm vorübergehend heller, während Sie Morse-Signal senden, so können Sie es als Lichtquelle verwendet werden.
trans-unit.note: Explains what Output Brighten Screen does.

trans-unit.id: While this option is turned on (recommended), the application will automatically decode prosign based on the context of surrounding Morse code.
trans-unit.source: While this option is turned on (recommended), the application will automatically decode prosign based on the context of surrounding Morse code.
trans-unit.target: Während diese Option auf (empfohlen) gedreht wird, dekodieren die Anwendung wird automatisch ProSign basierend auf dem Kontext Morse-Code umgibt.
trans-unit.note: A description on settings page, explaining what does Decode Prosign switch do.

trans-unit.id: While this option is turned on, an App Store link for this App will be added when you share a Morse code.
trans-unit.source: While this option is turned on, an App Store link for this App will be added when you share a Morse code.
trans-unit.target: Während diese Option aktiviert ist, wird ein App Store-Link für diese App hinzugefügt werden, wenn Sie einen Morse-Code teilen.
trans-unit.note: A description on settings page, explaining what Download Link switch do.

trans-unit.id:
To make new language setting take effect, please restart application with following steps:

1. Double-tap Home button on your device.

2. Swipe up to terminate application in the background.

3. Start application from home screen.
trans-unit.source:
To make new language setting take effect, please restart application with following steps:
1. Double-tap Home button on your device.
2. Swipe up to terminate application in the background.
3. Start application from home screen.

trans-unit.id: When you have it on, the App will try to auto-correct misspelled words when decoding Morse code. The dictionary changes when you change your language setting.
trans-unit.source: When you have it on, the App will try to auto-correct misspelled words when decoding Morse code. The dictionary changes when you change your language setting.

trans-unit.id: When you have it on, the screen will temporarily become brighter while you send Morse signal, so you can use it as a light source.
trans-unit.source: When you have it on, the screen will temporarily become brighter while you send Morse signal, so you can use it as a light source.
